/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/Hello-World.dir/source/ball.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hello-World.dir/source/color.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hello-World.dir/source/input.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hello-World.dir/source/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hello-World.dir/source/nonedit.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hello-World.dir/source/other_handlers.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Hello-World.dir/source/timer.cpp.o  -o Hello-World libraries/glfw/src/libglfw3.a libglad.a -ldl -lGL -lGLEW -lGLU -lGL -lpthread -lrt -lm -ldl -lGLEW -lGLU
